tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE invasive_species_movement_data (
  species_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50),
  latitude DECIMAL(8,6),
  longitude DECIMAL(9,6),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE movement_data (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(255),
    location_id INT,
    movement_type VARCHAR(50),
    movement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE location_data (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE movement_data (
    movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    movement_date DATE NOT NULL,
    movement_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES species(species_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE species (
    species_id INT,
    species_name VARCHAR(255),
    species_type VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (species_id)
)

CREATE TABLE tracking_data (
    data_id INT,
    species_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date_time DATETIME,
    PRIMARY KEY (data_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES species(species_id)
)

CREATE TABLE movements (
    movement_id INT,
    data_id INT,
    movement_type VARCHAR(100),
    distance FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (movement_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES tracking_data(data_id)
)

CREATE TABLE observation (
    observation_id INT,
    data_id INT,
    observer_name VARCHAR(255),
    observation_desc TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (observation_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES tracking_data(data_id)
)

CREATE TABLE movement_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                         species_name VARCHAR(255),
                         movement_type VARCHAR(50),
                         location_id INT,
                         date_time TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE location_data (location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                         location_name VARCHAR(255),
                         latitude FLOAT,
                         longitude FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE species_movement (movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                         species_id INT,
                         location_id INT,
                         movement_type VARCHAR(50),
                         date_time TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE species_interaction (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                           species_id_1 INT,
                           species_id_2 INT,
                           interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
                           interaction_description TEXT);
